reviews.text:
Great Italian restaurant!
The menu was well-balanced, and everything tasted delicious. I visited with my friends, and we enjoyed all the food and wine ‚Äî a wonderful dining experience overall!

The best gnocchi in town. Reminds me of the gnocchi I had in Roma. Authentic as hell. La pera insalata was fantastic as well. Brandon has to be one of the best bartenders in the city. Thanks, Brandon. Ask for him when you stop by! Best drinks in house!
Amazing service. Gnocci is as amazeeee. Brandon was the best
Brandon was so sweet and amazing!
Edison was amazing with us ! Thanks for the dinner

Kristelyn she was wonderful, service was great -
Anything we ask for they provided
What an amazing experience! Highly recommend you checking it out!! Delicious!! Outstanding!! I‚Äôll be back!

First time in the service was warm, welcoming and attentive - the hostess and my server, Kristelyn, were amazing !! The Negroni was best I‚Äôve ever had! Food equaled service excellent Vongole - you can‚Äôt go wrong here. Love the warm NYC Italian cozy vibe
Amazing food, great vibes, attentive service!
Kristelyn was great! We came here for dinner and drinks before a concert.
Great food and quick service! Don‚Äôt skip on dessert!

Pre-evening concert reservation. Nice receptionist, waitpeople. Noise level high.
We had cheap ($40) red, which was fine. Shared calamari (excellent because they were not overbreaded, were large, and came with half a lemon), good side of broccoli rabe, and pasta alla Norcia ( good but short on the sausage and the place the dish is named  for. Bread was flavorful, and the table water was filtered and excellent.
Why a lower rating than the food deserves? First of all the service is rushed and a bit relentless, as if controlled by a timer in the kitchen.
Second, the tip options on our bill started at 20 %.
Probably a great place to have a quick lunch.
Great food! Great atmosphere! Great Edison
Sooo good

The service at this establishment is truly exceptional. The staff members are consistently friendly and welcoming, and whenever I dine at the bar, Brandon demonstrates the utmost professionalism. His attentive service ensures a relaxing and uniquely enjoyable experience. As a recommendation, I highly suggest trying the Rigatoni Pollo Pazzo, complemented perfectly by their freshly baked bread.

Came from CA to visit NYC with my family and we love Italian cuisine, so we wanted to find something authentic.The food was amazing, the service was outstanding, and the atmosphere was warm and inviting. Great experience. Would recommend 10/10!
Server was very attentive and wonderful! Lighting and atmosphere was so great. We will be back.
The greatest atmosphere! Food and service 10/10!!
Our waiter Edison fantastic!!!!!
Great place to try delicious Italian food. The waiter was very nice.
When I think about Italian this is. The place I go.
Regine was great - great fixe priced linch
We had our son‚Äôs 13th birthday here and got great food and great service! All his friends and their parents were full and happy! Thanks so much!

We had an amazing time at Boca Di Bacco. We come here all the time and tonight we came to celebrate my sons birthday. He loves this place! Our server was Kristelyn. She‚Äôs great, very attentive and so sweet! We appreciate your service! Food was great as always!
Edison is the man! Food and service were both incredible!
Server Kristelyn is great! Great service! Great Food!
Delicioso, buen servicio

Spacious. Great location. Great for people watching. 3-course lunch special is only $25 and is delicious. There were only a few people in the entire space so you can have a normal conversation at your lunch meeting.

I held a Pre 50th High School Reunion Dinner here recently. The manager Neftali went above and beyond to ensure that we had the very best time! His staff was Wonderful and all the reviews were that it was an amazing dinner and evening!
Zoe is the best!! Would come back
Zoe is the best! Loved it
Zoe and the rest of staff were excellent! Sat outside. The food and atmosphere were perfect for a Sunday afternoon.

≈öwietna w≈Çoska knajpa na rogu 9th Avenue i 20th Street! Bardzo mi≈Ça i profesjonalna obs≈Çuga od samego wej≈õcia. Na start spr√≥bowa≈Çem przystawki z o≈õmiorniczki ‚Äì delikatna i naprawdƒô godna miejsca. Lazania okaza≈Ça siƒô wy≈õmienita, zdecydowanie jedna z najlepszych, jakie jad≈Çem. Stek przygotowany perfekcyjnie, pe≈Çna profeska! Na deser czekoladowy mus i tiramisu ‚Äì oba przepyszne i idealne na zako≈Ñczenie wieczoru. GorƒÖco polecam ka≈ºdemu, kto chce poczuƒá prawdziwy smak w≈Çoskiej kuchni w Nowym Jorku.
Our server, Kristelyn was beyond professional and beyond marvelous making our special birthday so memorable. Food was excellent. Service and her warm heart made it perfect. Thank you!
Fantastic
I loved it so mucho. Especially Edison?????!!!!!!!!! Edison is so personable and MADE OUR EXPERIENCEB!!!!!! Coming back just for him üòúüòùüòùüòùüòùüòù
It‚Äôs very pretty inside when they have the doors open, carbonara is very good
I‚Äôm phenomenal service

Overall great! I think we may have been there through a shift change OR I may just be ‚Äúdemanding‚Äù. I‚Äôm not sure which, because I wanted water after being seated, and I waited a bit, before flagging someone down. They were NOT my waiter / server‚Ä¶ BUT the place was EMPTY. So I don‚Äôt think I should‚Äôve waited at all for water. Because it was very warm outside and yet empty INSIDE the restaurant. Outside of that hiccup the food, the service and everything  for the remainder of our stay was PERFECT! They were very accommodating, attentive and overall great. I definitely will be coming there again!

We ate outside since we brought our dog. But we have eaten inside many times before and the experience has been excellent. The menu is quite extensive and the chef doesn‚Äôt shy away from custom requests. Our server today was Regine. She was very nice!
The quality of food, service and ambience at this Italian restaurant is one of the best we have experienced in Manhattan. Crhristaline, our server was magnificent. A must try!

food was good but service was just okay. it took a little minute for me to be greeted even though when i walked in the restaurant was completely empty.

there was a guy working there, i was told his name was messi? i‚Äôm not sure if he was a busser, bartender, server but i do think his customer service could be better. wasn‚Äôt outright rude but wasn‚Äôt friendly.

i had asked him if he could let my waitress know i was ready for my check since i couldn‚Äôt find her & my lunch break was almost over. he said he would but i realized he didn‚Äôt when a few minutes later she walked out & right past me.

she said he didn‚Äôt speak english which okay, that‚Äôs absolutely not a problem. but i would appreciate if instead of ignoring me, he actually got someone who could help me.

love the restaurant but wouldn‚Äôt return to this location.
Kristelyn was a great waitress.  The entire staff was very welcoming. The food was amazing! First time here and my friend and I shall be back!! Highly recommend.
Great food
Great food, service, and atmosphere

Awesome Service, delicious food, Burrata is a must try!
Brandon, our waiter was amazing.
Excellent menu, great selection of wines, outstanding service.
The best little local Chelsea spot
Great food and service. Happy Hour is excellent!
Edison was great‚Äî definitely coming back for brunch!
Îü∞ÏπòÏä§ÌéòÏÖúÏù¥ Í∞ÄÍ≤©ÎåÄÎπÑ Í¥úÏ∞ÆÏïòÏäµÎãàÎã§.

Delicious meal! Didn‚Äôt have a reservation and they welcomed me in and gave me a table up front. I had the Restaurant Week menu and absolutely loved the appetizer and the fresh cooked bread. I can‚Äôt wait to come back again and will ask for Edison!

One of my favorite brunch spots in nyc. First time here and the service was spectacular. Edison, our waiter, was so fun and friendly. The food is great and there‚Äôs bottomless brunch for $26. All around a great experience and I will be coming back here!!

The host was very friendly and welcoming. The atmosphere was cozy and intimate. All of the staff were friendly and professional. Service was excellent, fast, and accurate, also very attentive. Food was super delicious. I had the rigatoni vodka, and for a pasta dish that seems so simple, the flavors definitely stood out. My guest had the linguine bolognese, which she also expressed was a great dish. I‚Äôve come here before, and the food was amazing then as well as it is now. This might be my new favorite restaurant. It‚Äôs great for dates, even big parties. I might say I‚Äôd even solo dine here, that‚Äôs how nice it is üòé oh and amazing job from my server Kristelyn!

Run don't walk, This place is fantastic! A friend came to town and we decided to grab dinner here to catch up. We were greeted with huge smiles, and when we mentioned we were catching up, they seated us at a 4-top booth so we could sit next to each other and chat! It was incredibly kind, I know places don't do that, so it just shows how kind the staff were. We got some lovely wine & a spritz, then we ended up order the same Rigatoni dish with Vodka sauce, Chicken, and sun dried tomatoes, delicious! Everyone who came by to check made us feel special and welcomed. We never felt rushed out, and when we left we were given sweet waves as if we were regulars who had been coming there for years. Highly recommend, I'll definitely be back!

Bocca Di Bacoo is an absolute gem. During the summer they have a Happy Hour from 4pm - close. Wow! I got the Tuna Tartare and the Crab were fantastic. Danny, the bartender made the best cocktail, a Basil Bocca.

I will definitely return and recommend this place to anyone looking for amazing drinks and excellent service. The brunch food was decent, but the highlight of the breakfast was definitely the home fries‚Äîthey were absolutely delicious.

My husband and I stumbled upon this place yesterday. Since it was the only spot with people at an off hour (3:40 PM), we decided to give it a try. The atmosphere, lighting, and wonderful music by Sinatra, Dean Martin, and Bobby Darin really captivated us. The service couldn‚Äôt have been better, and our food was exceptionally delicious. I had a Mediterranean salad, and my husband said his Caesar Salad was worthy of a Michelin star. We also shared the ahi tuna tartare appetizer, which was super delicious. Their homemade, paper-thin potato chips were so good that I asked for more. I look forward to coming back soon and trying other items on their menu.

The staff were very nice when speaking and tending to us with our food and beverages, especially Kristellyn. She was very welcoming and kind with us. The food was very delicious, would definitely recommend coming here.

Edison was a very attentive without being overbearing. Check the on us when it was necessary's and made sure that we were always happy. The hostess welcomed With a warm smile, we knew at that moment that we were going to have a wonderful experience.

I had a wonderful dining experience here! The food was absolutely delicious ‚Äì the vodka pasta in particular was outstanding. The atmosphere is beautiful and pleasant, with a stylish and elegant interior that makes you feel instantly comfortable. The service was excellent and very attentive. A special shout-out to Kristelyn, who took care of us that evening ‚Äì she was exceptionally friendly, professional, and made the whole experience even more enjoyable. It was a truly lovely evening, and I can highly recommend coming here. Definitely worth a visit!

Wow great Italian spot
The brunch menu is really good. There is a variety of types and choices. Our server was very accommodating and not pushy. The food came out fast. The burger üçî was delicious ü§§ü§§. The chicken üêî Parm was huge. The eggplant üçÜ Parm was delicious too. The dessert are portions very large enough to share. They wide selection of alcoholic and non alcoholic drinks. The grilled octopus üêô and fried shrimp with calamari was really good there is in door and outdoor seating.

Our bartender Daniel was so amazing. He took amazing care of us and was so attentive and he deserves a raise. Loves him so much. I ordered the happy hour sliders which comes with fries and hood sides sliders. I also ordered the very berry cocktail from happy hour. It was so yummy, pace yourself though, it sneaks up on you. The vibes are intimate, modern and chic for the place. Highly recommend it.

Went here for a brunch event, and I can‚Äôt say I was impressed, unfortunately. The staff was a bit all over the place, they got our order wrong, and the bottles of water they brought around to use had mildew on the lids (on multiple bottles, not just one).

The food was alright, but not something I was terribly impressed by.
Lovely atmosphere, and the food tasted fresh and delicious.Our waiter Eddy was great and made sure we were taken care of :) would definitely come again!

We were looking for a good Italian restaurant in Chelsea and found this gem. The service was outstanding, starting with Zoe, the friendliest hostess. The drinks were delicious and the food was amazing. The bread and pasta were so fresh! Everything was so flavorful, and the atmosphere was delightful. We will definitely be returning.

Love this place, come here frequently! Most recent visit was today for brunch. The bottomless brunch deal is amazing! Ambiance is always so nice. During the week it‚Äôs never too busy. Great drinks and even better food. My favorite dishes are the rigatoni vodka & the pera salad. Don‚Äôt get me started on the pistachio cr√®me br√ªl√©e ü§§ü§§Got my family thanksgiving from here so I didn‚Äôt have to cook and it was a great, looking forward to their new years specials!

Segunda vez en el lugar y como siempre, la m√°s feliz y encantada, la atenci√≥n del bartender Daniel es la mejor y los c√≥cteles ü§§üëåüèΩüôåüèΩ es un genio. El
Manager Eduardo con su hospitalidad 10/10 definitivamente volver√© todas las veces!! Aparte que si happy hour de todo el d√≠a es un LUJO!

This spot is perfect for happy hour! It‚Äôs my second time here, and I have to say‚ÄîEdison (the bartender) is incredible. He puts so much passion into every drink, and they always turn out amazing. Definitely a go-to place for a great time. Just do me a favor‚Äîsave a table for me and my friends!!!! Neftali the manager is also AMAZING!!!! 10/10 Service
Our favorite neighborhood spot. They have the most gorgeous indoor / outdoor setup - it feels like you‚Äôre in Europe as you dine. 10/10

Reserved a dinner table for my partners birthday and I couldn‚Äôt be happier with the location and service we were provided.

We came in for dinner and the ambience was very romantic and intimate.

This would be a great place to dine if you want to take someone on a special but lowkey date. Lights are dimmed and the seating is just enough space in between you and others that allows for a more private dining experience.

We had River help us with everything from welcoming us in, to seating us, to serving us. He went above and beyond to accommodate us and make my partners birthday special.

The food was great. The Nonna‚Äôs meatballs were just perfect, not too bland or overpowering with seasonings it was in this light tomato sauce(tasted a bit like marinara but not quite). The calamari I normally like it fried a bit more but that‚Äôs my personal preference.

The mashed potatoes are creamy but light and fluffy. Steak was great when they made it over. The drinks were great. If you‚Äôre not a heavy drinker and want to try a fruity cocktail definitely go for a Brazilian Breeze cocktail. I personally loved the 1699 Sidecar, it was stronger for those who like their drinks stronger and it has a perfect touch of citrus.

Definitely recommend and will be returning for brunch.

Came here for brunch on a Sunday around 12:30pm and there were plenty of open tables. By 2pm the place was at about 80% capacity. They have a brunch menu but also serve their regular menu as well. I tried the crab Benedict and liked it a lot! The vibe of the spot was classy and fun and they also have a $26 boozy brunch deal!

Delicious restaurant in the heart of Chelsea. Here for a boozy brunch with tall portions. Value is great on bottomless. Crab Benedict was delicious. The steak with the steak and eggs was a little tough; it could have been seared a little‚Ä¶

Ordered the Taglierine with Crab Meat and Squid Ink Pasta.

Pasta was horribly overcooked.

Was not brought ice despite asking for it twice. Disappointed.

We had the best time here!! I had a party of about 25 people and they gave us the private room downstairs. They were so so so accommodating with everything - we were even able to bring a small dog in that private area! The service was amazing and they provided us with extra shots at the end of event and even let us stay as long as possible since there was no reservation after us. This was my second birthday with bocca di bacco in Chelsea and I will definitely be back!! We even got to play our own music!!the nicest and most accommodating restaurant ever

I came here for my birthday and it was the best time ever. The bartender/server delivered such a great experience for me and my friends. We came for happy hour and the drinks were delicious and the bar bites were amazing. 10/10!

Wow! I can't believe we have never been to this place! The food is really top notch, the staff is super nice, and it's a beautiful space. We walked in for lunch today, and it was empty. Normally, I would consider going elsewhere, but we went for it - and I'm so glad we did. Everything was super fresh and tasted authentic. Will definitely be back!

We absolutely love the lunch here. The wonderful dining room feels so inviting and warm.  Staff are always on point. The food is so delicious and what an incredible bargain the lunch specials are! They don‚Äôt skimp!!

Weekends are lovely to sit by the window and people each with some prosecco.

Came in with colleagues during restaurant week in NY. Great summertime ambience, upscale but super reasonable (NYC) prices. Loved the spaghetti arabiatta and the calamari. The sauce was delicious and amazingly flavorful. Left full and v delighted. Next time I'll be here with family.
Plenty of choices for their lunch prix fixe menu. I wasn't fond of the trimasu but the linguine pesto n the crab cakes. Amazing !!!

We had very kind and attentive service. Very professional staff. The food was delicious! We started with the grilled watermelon salad and then had the eggplant Parmesan and Rigatoni Pollo Pazzo. Dishes we would recommend. Great environment for a date night, dinner with friends or would be delicious as take out. Highly recommend.
Restaurant italien tr√®s bien, service impeccable et propose un menu √† 25 $ entr√©e plat et dessert! Les plats sont bons. A tester

Having chosen to sit at the sidewalk seating area, in glorious weather, that shouldn't mean not having access to waiting staff when you need. But for some reason it does here. I asked for some bread and oil. The bread had clearly been pre-cut some three or four hours earlier and was as stale as can be. By the time I found some help to remedy this (the table cleaning staff, who took the bread away and still fully squirted and wiped down the table next to me before taking my complaint indoors), my entree arrived before the new bread. I didn't want it anymore.

Short rib and mash sounds great, but it's not on the rib, it's not much to get excited by and I left half of it. A single lump of galatinous 'cheap-cut' slow cooked meat.

Underwhelming in the extreme. I will not be back.

I recently had a wonderful experience at Bocca di Bacco that exceeded all expectations. From the moment we arrived, Eduardo and his team went above and beyond to make us feel welcome. Their friendliness and attention to detail truly made our evening special.
The quality of the food was outstanding. Every dish we tried was delicious and thoughtfully prepared. The Mediterranean salad was fresh and vibrant, with crisp greens and a perfectly balanced vinaigrette. The mushroom truffle pasta was a standout-rich, creamy, and bursting with earthy truffle flavor. The lasagna was hearty and comforting, with layers of tender pasta, savory sauce, and just the right amount of cheese.
What really set the experience apart was the staff. Eduardo and his team were not only knowledgeable about the menu but also genuinely warm and attentive. They accommodated our early arrival without hesitation and made sure every aspect of our meal was enjoyable. The ambiance was lively yet cozy, making it an ideal spot for both groups and intimate dinners.
Overall, Bocca di Bacco delivered a fantastic dining experience with high-quality Italian cuisine and exceptional hospitality. I highly recommend this restaurant for anyone looking for great food and a welcoming atmosphere in New York City. We will definitely be returning!

Libby was phenomenal. The food was spectacular. This $25 lunch special is untouchable and I hope you guys do not take this away. We need this in New York! Thank you so much, and I can‚Äôt wait to come back. TikTok incoming @imcourttoo

I visit NYC every couple of months for work and often find myself here for happy hour. The oysters are always great! Their wine selection is one of the better ones in the city for a happy hour. And Neftali is the kindest person around!

I came here for brunch yesterday and I must say I enjoyed myself very well. I got the unlimited drinks. Becareful because those mimosas will sneak up on you. The waiters are very patient, and they work very hard. I had the screwdriver very‚Ä¶
